attributes.action: Suspend MPs who dishonored the original terms of Brexit pending investigation.
attributes.additional_details:
Prime Minister David Cameron 10 Nov 2015 stated "When the British people speak, their voice will be respected – not ignored. If we vote to leave, then we will leave. There will not be another renegotiation and another referendum." Source https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-speech-on-europe

However, there has been renegotiation against the majority vote.

The MCA states "don't treat a person as lacking the capacity to make a decision just because they make an unwise decision"
attributes.background:
What the people of the UK were voting on was clear. The Prime Minister laid it out clearly in his Chatham House speech.

The vote was to leave without a deal.

Any MP who broke this agreement should be expelled from parliament for and tried for treason.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions. 

You might like to consider signing this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
